content: yarn draw end through the remaining 2 sts secure and hide in hat finishing page 5 girl with hijab instructions using your boot color cast on 16 sts divide the sts over 2 or 3 dpns and join to work in the round round 1 k3 mb small k1 mb small k10 change to dress color round 2 knit round 3 purl round 4-9 knit 6 rounds redistribute the sts to 2 dpns needle 1 & 2 now both have 8 sts each round 10 ssk k4 k2tog repeat 12 sts round 11 knit round 12 mb large k4 mb large k6 change to hijab color round 13-14 knit round 15 k9 m1l k3 13 sts round 16 k3 yo k10 14 sts round 17 ssk k1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 into next stitch k1 k2tog k7 18 sts round 18 ssk k7 k2tog k7 16 sts round 19-20 knit round 21 ssk k5 k2tog k7 14 sts 3 round 22 ssk k3 k2tog repeat 10 sts round 23 ssk k1 k2tog repeat 6 sts break yarn draw end through the remaining 6 sts secure and hide in hat hijab for shoulders the part of the hijab that is around the shoulders is knit separately in the round and sewn into place using your hijab color cast on 16 sts divide the sts over 2 or 3 dpns and join to work in the round round 1-2 k1 p1 repeat till end of round do a yarn over bind-off see video pg 2 cut yarn leaving a long tail for sewing to doll in finishing weave in the cast on end finishing page 6 boy instructions using your boot color cast on 16 sts divide the sts over 2 or 3 dpns and join to work in the round round 1 k3 mb small k1 mb small k10 change to pants color round 2 knit round 3 purl round 4-9 knit 6 rounds redistribute the sts to 2 dpns needle 1 & 2 now both have 8 sts each round 10 ssk k4 k2tog repeat 12 sts change to shirt color round 11 knit round 12 purl round 13-15 knit round 16 mb large k4 mb large k6 round 13 k9 m1l k3 13 sts change to hair color round 14 k3 yo k10 14 sts round 15 ssk k1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 into next stitch k1 k2tog k7 18 sts round 16 ssk k7 k2tog k7 16 sts change to hat color round 17-18 knit round 19 ssk k5 k2tog k7 14 sts round 20 ssk k3 k2tog repeat 10 sts round 21 ssk k1 k2tog repeat 6 sts round 22 k1 k2tog repeat 4 sts round 23 s1 k1 psso repeat 2sts break yarn draw end through the remaining 2 sts secure and hide in hat finishing page 6 4 finishing girl finishing please note i find it easier to weave in all my ends at the end long hair for
